Search

Search Roger—the UC San Diego Library catalog. Find books, e-books, media, maps, government documents, journals (by title), and more.
Search for journal and magazine articles via Worldcat Local (Melvyl).
Search for specialized databases to help with your research.
Search for journals via Roger Journal Search.
Search digitized versions of archival and primary source materials from the Library collection and campus research data.
Search selected subject and course research guides hand-picked by our librarians.
Search the Library's website.
Also Try → Roger, Advanced Roger Search, Circuit (For UC San Diego + SDSU, USD, CSU-SM, & Public Libraries), WorldCat (Melvyl)
Also Try → Citation Linker (For full text or availability info)
Also Try → Databases by Name, Databases by Subject, Academic Search Complete, JSTOR, ProQuest, PubMed, Web of Science
Also Try → Find e-Journals
Also Try → Digital Collections, eScholarship (For UC dissertations & faculty-deposited materials), Calisphere (For statewide digitized collections), Special Collections & Archives
Also Try → Subject Guides, Course Guides, How-to Guides
Also Try → Advanced Search (Campus)

Geisel Library Revitalization Initiative

In summer of 2015, the Library launched the Geisel Library Revitalization Initiative (GLRI) to “transform and revitalize the interior public spaces” of the Geisel Library.

The vision of the GLRI is to develop a more cohesive, holistic user environment and provide a better user experience.

Three floors are included in the Initiative — the main (2nd), ground (1st), and top (8th) floors.

LEARN MORE

Visit Us

The Library offers a wide variety of spaces to accommodate both collaborative and solitary study, as well as areas for more specialized work.

Campaign for the Library

Whether knowledge rests on a printed page or comes to life on a computer, the UC San Diego Library is the premier resource for our voracious community of changemakers. With your philanthropic support of the Library—which contributes to the Campaign for UC San Diego—you can inspire great faculty and student minds by helping us deliver digital resources that support the university’s world-class research and instruction.

GIVE TODAY
